response.overview: Mohammad Vali Gandami, the last guardian of Iran's ancient windmills (Asbads), dedicates this life to their preservation. Built to harness wind in arid regions, these historical sturctures face neglect and risk disappearing. The film showcases Gandami's knowledge, the architectural ingenuity of the Asbads, and the urgent need to pass on this heritage to future generations.
response.title: Wind's Heritage
